Text: Would be nice to have it divided into chapters instead of just 2 files. Otherwise great
Bad quality...  It's sounds ok, but it's very choppy, and it skips throughout. Would be nice to have an audiobook format instead of MP3.
Skips and jumps throughout, making some parts unlistenable. However you can get the gist for most of those bit. Not too bad, but would be nice to have a version up that didn't skip.
